About Me

BIO

Skilled in JavaScript, vanilla JS, OOP, SASS, React, Redux, ES6, Node.js, SPA Development, Unit testing and automation. Strong engineering professional with a Master's degree focused in INFORMATION SCIENCE from UNIVERSITY OF NORTH TEXAS.
